resources.string:
Version 1.0.0
What\'s New: • Four game modes: Classic, Dark, Timed, Daily Challenge • Four unique maps with different difficulties • Six power-up types: Speed, Slow, Ghost, Bomb, Shrink, Double • Pixel retro graphics with CRT scanline effects • 8-bit background music and sound effects • Full-screen support for notch and Dynamic Island • Local leaderboard system • Virtual button controls optimized for mobile
Enjoy the classic snake game with a modern twist!
